channel.title: Wow, another one...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wow, another one..."

item.title: Re: Wow, another one...
item.content:encoded:
It was impossible until McMasters added Cobrakai. At that point, it became just a matter of time. To complete it you need:

- All 3 Sannin themes (This means you must be at least season 4).
- Bankai
- Cobrakai
- The Note
- The Tote
- Not Wasteland Disease
- Eye of the Storm
- An Epic Village with 50 Ninja in it (this means Epic Monument)
- The Village must have at least 70 upgrades, 20 of which are kaiju upgrades
- A full moon
- Be Sannin

Keep in mind, there's only been 11 people who've completed it thus far, and generally they've been regarded as the Leaders of the most successful villages in the game.

item.title: Wow, another one...
item.content:encoded: It is clearly obvious that the Impossible Mission isn't that impossible considering how many people have completed itâ€¦
